amendment.description: To require a report on the status of the Four Forest Restoration Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1215 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1215 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McSally to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6314) To require a report on the status of the Four Forest Restoration Initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1215 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1215 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator McSally to Amendment SA 948.
